name: Endgegner4Ever
description:
Endgegner 4 Ever is a classical arcade game. Your typical bullet hell. How far can you go, which will be the biggest endgegner you can defeat? You wont get any stronger... But your enemy will!

Endgegner 4 Ever currently has no add`s, no ingame purchases and does not collect any personal data. I have developed this game for fun and hope you enjoy it! You might need a good phone to play this game especially for the later levels.

Originally developed for smartphones i decyded to also release this game on itch.io. 

  • Click and hold the left mouse button to move your ship. 
  • Double click to cycle through shooting modes.
  • Dont let your green core get hit by anything.
  • When you complete a level you get some time.
  • why your ship is destroyed you lose some time.
  • When your time is up its game over! 
  • Can you beat 71 levels?
  • Have fun playing!
  • Please let me know what you think about it :)
